name: UVRModeSettings
doc: Implements the settings for VR Mode.

InteractorHand: Which hand should have the primary interactor laser on it
UIBrightness: Adjusts the brightness of the UI panels
GizmoScale: The size of the transform gizmo
DoubleClickTime: The maximum time in seconds between two clicks for a double-click to register
TriggerPressedThreshold_Vive: The amount (between 0-1) you have to depress the Vive controller trigger to register a press
TriggerPressedThreshold_Rift: The amount (between 0-1) you have to depress the Oculus Touch controller trigger to register a press
ModeClass: The mode extension to use when UnrealEd is in VR mode. Use VREditorMode to get default editor behavior or select a custom mode.
bEnableAutoVREditMode: If true, wearing a Vive or Oculus Rift headset will automatically enter VR Editing mode
bAutokeySequences: Whether or not sequences should be autokeyed
bShowWorldMovementGrid: Show the movement grid for orientation while moving through the world
bShowWorldMovementPostProcess: Dim the surroundings while moving through the world
bShowWorldScaleProgressBar: Display a progress bar while scaling that shows your current scale
